title: Python 101.0 - Learn Programming with Python! (Part 1)
description:
This hands-on coding workshop is for people completely new to programming. Bring your laptop, running Windows, Mac OS, or Linux. 

We'll be using [Koding.com](https://koding.com/ "") for all examples and assignments. You can sign up for a free account before the class to get a head start.

### Class Requirments

- Computer with a web browser
- Free [Koding.com](https://koding.com/ "") account
